explains: adj. 伤感情的，伤自尊的

sentences.en: I cannot forget the hurtful things he said.
sentences.cn: 我无法忘记他的那些伤感情的话。

sentences.en: The bad reviews of her new book were very hurtful to her.
sentences.cn: 对她的新书的负面评论使她很难过。

sentences.en: Her comments can only be very hurtful to Mrs. Green's family.
sentences.cn: 她的话只会使格林太太一家人感到非常伤心。
